sub_fields.label: Background color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Theme green: #83cac6 | Theme red: #f9bdb2 | Theme yellow: #f0e856

sub_fields.label: Show numbering
sub_fields.name: show_numbering
sub_fields.instructions: This selection allows you to show or hide the numbering between the steps

sub_fields.label: Section heading
sub_fields.name: section_heading
sub_fields.instructions:
Section heading -field supports screen reader users by describing the accordion section.
For example: Use here the same heading (h2) text that one used inside the Content area earlier.

sub_fields.label: Side
sub_fields.name: side
sub_fields.instructions: Side where the background image appears

sub_fields.label: Background color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Background color of the text box

sub_fields.label: Links
sub_fields.name: links
sub_fields.instructions: Links for additional information. You can add multiple links.

sub_fields.label: Text overlay
sub_fields.name: text_overlay
sub_fields.instructions: Choose whether the text should overlay the image or appear beside it.

sub_fields.label: Links
sub_fields.name: links
sub_fields.instructions: Links for additional information. You can add multiple links.

sub_fields.name: contact_hours_days
sub_fields.instructions: Mon, Tue, Wed or Monday - Friday

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title_contact
sub_fields.placeholder: For example "Where is International House Helsinki"

sub_fields.label: Anchor tag
sub_fields.name: anchor_tag
sub_fields.instructions: This block creates anchor tag to the page and you can use anchor link to link to it. Please don't use spaces or special characters.
